attributes.action: TV Debate with David Cameron & Alex Salmond
attributes.additional_details:
In this media age surly it’s time for moving with the times & having a proper series of live and unedited TV debates between these two leaders on the question of Scottish independence. This should take place in Edinburgh or Glasgow & be broadcast through Scotland in order for voters to evaluate the benefits of independence or the benefits of no change.
I want the British government to agree to have David Cameron, take part in live TV debates with Alex Salmond.
